video_prompt: The girls' long black hair subtly sways. Their pleated skirts ripple slightly with an undetectable breeze. Their chests gently rise and fall as if breathing. Subtle blinks pass over their eyes. The camera very slowly zooms in and out.
image_prompt:
Two 3D realistic anime-style girls, appearing as mirrored reflections of each other, positioned side-by-side but not perfectly symmetrical, slight variation. Both have long, flowing dark hair and wear dark blue sailor uniforms with white collars, white sailor ties tied around their necks. The uniforms feature long sleeves, pleated skirts with white trim along the hemline. They wear dark knee-high socks with a subtle patterned texture and black loafers with small heels.

The girls have delicate facial features, subtle makeup, and warm, soft lighting that highlights their skin and hair. The background is a plain, light blue to light gray gradient, creating a clean studio shot feel. The overall atmosphere is serene and youthful. A silver "C29" watermark is visible in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle hair sway, skirt ripple, gentle chest rise/fall, soft blinks. Very slow, imperceptible camera zoom in/out.
creative_video_prompt_1: The girls' long black hair thrashes violently. Their pleated skirts rip, spiraling outward with an explosive burst of wind. Their chests contort unnaturally, eyes flashing with malevolent energy. The camera whips around them, a vortex of chaos. The very air shimmers and distorts, hinting at reality's unraveling.
creative_video_prompt_2: The girls' long black hair unravels into swirling galaxies. Their pleated skirts morph into iridescent wings, each pleat shedding shimmering dust. Their chests expand and contract like cosmic gas clouds, revealing shifting constellations within. Their eyes become portals to other dimensions, subtly blinking entire realities into existence. The camera very slowly zooms in and out, distorting space and time.
creative_video_prompt_3:
The girls' long black hair subtly sways. Their pleated skirts ripple slightly with an undetectable breeze. Their chests gently rise and fall as if breathing. Subtle blinks pass over their eyes. The camera very slowly zooms in and out.
As if startled, both girls' heads snap up, eyes wide, before slowly turning to face each other in perfect synchronicity. A gradual close-up on their identical expressions of surprise. The lighting subtly brightens from behind, casting a soft, ethereal glow as they mirror each other, a cinematic pause before an unseen reveal.
